name: Emergency Shelter & Safety
shortDescription: Immediate safe housing, basic needs, and crisis support for women and children escaping violence.
exampleCosts: $40 = one night of safe shelter for a mother and child
$120 = emergency essentials (food, toiletries, transportation) for a family

name: Counselling & Healing
shortDescription: Individual and group counselling to help survivors process trauma and rebuild confidence.

name: Children & Youth Support
shortDescription: Specialized programs that help children feel safe, express emotions, and regain stability.
exampleCosts: $150 = one week of after-school support for a child

name: Community Education & Prevention
shortDescription: Workshops, outreach, and campaigns that raise awareness and prevent violence.
exampleCosts: $50 = printed materials for a community workshop
$200 = outreach session for a community group

name: Legal & Social Support Referrals
shortDescription: Guidance and referrals to legal, housing, and social services to help survivors rebuild.
exampleCosts: $70 = support meeting with a social worker
$180 = accompaniment and translation for a legal appointment
